alert.note: Alert for Lower Clark Fork Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 17 at 7:24PM MST until December 20 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches along I-90 St. Regis to Huson and Highway 200 corridor, 6 to 15 inches from St. Regis to Lookout Pass, and 16 to 24 inches over Lookout Pass. Ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. * WHERE...Evaro Hill, Highway 200 Thompson Falls to Plains, Highway 200 Trout Creek to Heron, and I-90 Lookout Pass to Haugan. * WHEN...From Saturday morning through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
